output_list.reason: Integer overflow in the claimTile function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary value for the 'gameNumber' variable, allowing them to claim a tile and set the 'gameClaimed' variable to any value.
Integer overflow in the claimTile function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary value for the 'xCoord' variable, allowing them to claim a tile and set the 'gameClaimed' variable to any value.
Integer overflow in the claimTile function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary value for the 'yCoord' variable, allowing them to claim a tile and set the 'gameClaimed' variable to any value.

Integer overflow in the claimOwnersEarnings function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary value for the 'gameEarnings' variable, allowing them to claim a tile and set the 'gameEarnings' variable to any value.
